## Description {#details}

A class representing liveness information for a single basic block.

Each bit in the <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/bitvector">BitVector</a> represents the liveness property for a different stack slot.

Definition at line 387 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/stackcoloring-cpp">StackColoring.cpp</a>.
